messages.speech: Given the current shelter-in-place orders from a variety of states, then fewer people are driving, which means that there are fewer accidents. Given this decline, personal auto insurance customers will receive 20% back, based on their monthly premiums starting in April through the time period when the shelter-in-place orders are lifted. We will automatically deposit into your bank account or credit the card on file. Make sure your payment information is up-to-date.
